xalener:

Wow. Turns out This guy is responsible for a LOT of shit Tim Burton got credit for… Or at least did just as much work as Tim on all of those projects. It’s a shame he’s so under credited.

item.title: best HL speedrun
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
I believe that those that play for speedruns also play the game as intended. The speedrun is just a challenge (like the “Little Rocket Man” achievement in HL2:Ep2).

I agree. Real speedruns simply pown.

fucking wat to this whole thread. it could have just been mentioned in the Chat thread. besides, we’ve all seen like 5 different HL playthroughs and speedruns before. Freeman’s Mind is prolly the most entertaining one too and everybody has seen that shit.

Freeman’s mind sucks. It’s the dumbest, unfunniest thing I’ve ever watched. Too bad it takes place in the Half-Life-universe…

item.title: best HL speedrun

Ryλn:

wat. and wat to the Twinsen guy.

fucking wat to this whole thread. it could have just been mentioned in the Chat thread. besides, we’ve all seen like 5 different HL playthroughs and speedruns before. Freeman’s Mind is prolly the most entertaining one too and everybody has seen that shit.

Edit; btw Daniel, your cat sig reminds me of the movie Coraline. i watched that today out of bordom. Tim Burton is a fucking genius. okay, that is all.

I thought Tim Burton only produced Coroline and the movie had the same director as Nightmare before Christmas… which also wasn’t directed by Tim Burton?

https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0783139/

Wow. Turns out This guy is responsible for a LOT of shit Tim Burton got credit for… Or at least did just as much work as Tim on all of those projects. It’s a shame he’s so under credited.

If that means racing against the clock that’s fine.
